title: Has the COVID-19 pandemic impacted inequalities?
topic: New College of the Humanities Essay Competition
brief: In this essay, I discussed the role of the social economy and its participants in the inequalities exacerbated by the COVID-19 pandemic, as well as how policy instruments and social economy players can alleviate these inequalities
